data.comment: The match is underway in Pohang.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Pohang Steel Yard.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
In the minute 6, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
In the minute 9, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Incheon Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Incheon Utd pushes forward through Kim Do-hyeok, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 12, Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
Pohang Steelers's Manuel Palacios misses with an attempt on goal.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Pohang Steelers in Pohang.
In the minute 18, Free kick Pohang Steelers.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Free kick Incheon Utd.
Throw-in Incheon Utd.
In the minute 23, In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Pohang, Stanislav Iljutcenko of Pohang Steelers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 27, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
An attacking Incheon Utd player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Stefan Mugosa nets and Incheon Utd now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko waits before resuming play because Stefan Mugosa for Incheon Utd is still down.
Incheon Utdâ€™s Stefan Mugosa is on his feet again at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 33, Pohang Steelers drive upfield and Song Min-kyu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
Stanislav Iljutcenko grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 34, Great play from Lee Kwang-hyeok to set up the goal.
In Pohang Pohang Steelers drive forward through Stanislav Iljutcenko. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Hyung-Jin Ko awards the home team a throw-in.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Incheon Utd.
The first half has been concluded at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Pohang.
In Pohang, Manuel Palacios (Pohang Steelers) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
In the minute 51, Stefan Mugosa for Incheon Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pohang.
Pohang Steelers's Song Min-kyu gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Hyung-Jin Ko signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 55, Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
The away team replace Kang Yun-gu with Park Dae-han.
In the minute 58, In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a throw-in for Incheon Utd, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
Aleksandar Palocevic is on a sub for Song Min-kyu for Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stefan Mugosa (Incheon Utd) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers's Kwon Wan-kyu has been booked in Pohang.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Song Shi-uh is replacing Kim Jun-beom for the away team.
In the minute 70, Pohang Steelers make their second substitution with Shim Dong-un replacing Lee Kwang-hyeok.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Hyung-Jin Ko.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 74, Jae-seong Lee for Incheon Utd has been booked by Hyung-Jin Ko and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Incheon Utd are coming forward and Stefan Mugosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 79, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksandar Palocevic for Pohang Steelers drives towards goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Pohang Steel Yard.
The away team have replaced Ahn Jin-beom with Kim Dong-min. This is the third substitution made today by Wan-seop Lim.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 84, Hyung-Jin Ko awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Gi Dong Kim (Pohang Steelers) is making a third substitution, with Jun jae Nam replacing Manuel Palacios.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Incheon Utd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa breaks free at Pohang Steel Yard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Pohang.
Free kick Incheon Utd.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Incheon Utd.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hyung-Jin Ko blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
At Pohang Steel Yard, Mun Ji-hwan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
